summary: Licensed Perfusionist Melissa D. Harben voluntarily surrendered her license Y00014 to avoid further prosecution of disciplinary charges. Allegations included unprofessional conduct (failure to restock operating rooms, timely reporting for work), professional incompetence (improper equipment operation), and failing to meet standards (untimely reporting of cardiac ischemic time). The surrender is a final disciplinary action, treated as a revocation by the Board.
